Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 2; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Arcane Innate: +7 (charisma; trained); Occult: +7 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 17 (charisma; trained); Occult: 17 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation can substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Courageous Anthem (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Detect Magic (AC1): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-rank illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the level or rank of the most powerful effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the most powerful effect)
Lingering Composition (O1 Foc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the duration of a subsequent cantrip composition to 3 rd, or 4 rd on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
Soothe (O1): (2) R30' Target regains 1d10+4 HP and gains +2 saves vs. mental effects for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +1d10+4 HP)
Magic Notes:
Arcane Sense: Knows the Detect Magic arcane innate spell; can cast it at 1st rank at will
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Courageous Anthem occult spells/Has a focus pool
Lingering Composition: Knows the Lingering Composition occult spell
Maestro: Knows the Soothe occult spell
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Notes
Validation Errors: Unified Theory Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15 and arcana rank (currently 1) >= 4
